name: logo_api
description: This is a sub-function API for tool logo. Tool description: Find the Logo of each company in real-time. Using our logo finder service is entirely free with attribution. However, we require a link back to companyurlfinder.com on any page the service is used. Just use the following format to embed logos in your systems: API description: Using our logo finder service is entirely free with attribution.

domain.description: The domain name for which the logo is to be fetched.
